backend/main.mo: Backend actor handling Stripe checkout sessions, access-controlled profile management, and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping deployment documentation to components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide outlining prerequisites and steps to deploy the draft build to production on the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, theming, and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and html2pdf.js for PDF generation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with attribution, branding, and a brief description of the appâ€™s purpose.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, login/logout handling, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/InvoicePreview.t: Displays invoice details and enables PDF export using html2pdf.js.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapping pages with header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, logout, and restoring identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook that uses the actor to create checkout sessions from shopping items.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode, and utility classes including Indian color variants.
frontend/src/lib/gst.ts: Computes GST totals, tax percentages, and interstate status based on invoice data.
frontend/src/lib/states.ts: Exports a list of Indian states and union territories.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays user dashboard with subscription status, stats, and recent invoices, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceCreator.tsx: Interactive GST invoice builder supporting item management, validation, and logo upload.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the main marketing landing page with hero section, features, and CTAs for creating invoices or viewing pricing.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Displays a failure message after unsuccessful payment and provides options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Shows a success confirmation for completed payments with navigation to dashboard or invoice creation.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Implements the pricing plans UI and triggers a checkout session for the Pro subscription.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins with extended design tokens.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including features, state version, and project description.
